Headline: Normal Red Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier police investigation at Garfield. Normal service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier police investigation at Garfield. 

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Westbound Reroute near 71st/Dorchester
ShortDescription: WB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 67th, Cottage Grove and 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 67th, Cottage Grove and 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route). Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Reroute at Harlem/Grand
ShortDescription: 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Grand, Oak Park, North Ave and Harlem due to, street blockage near Harlem/Grand.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Grand, Oak Park, North Ave and Harlem due to, street blockage near Harlem/Grand.

Allow extra travel time.
